yeah thanks ellie it's great to be here
boral australia is the country's largest
building product supplier
we play an integral role in
residential commercial construction and
infrastructure
we supply products including cement
concrete asheville
timber plasterboard bricks and
quartering materials
we've been established for 74 years and
we currently
meet customer demand through 440 sites
across the country
wow i mean borle is australia's largest
construction material supplier
so how has the aws cloud change the way
that you guys
work the cloud has been great and it
really enabled us to make cost
improvements and efficiency improvements
through
the speed and agility that the cloud
offers
our product teams can easily start up
and terminate resources
which enables them to test products and
ideas
this allows us to innovate and make
better decisions
what an exciting time for boral and you
guys recently completed your migration
with one of our premier partners version
so what was it like exiting from your
data center
and how did berson help you guys manage
any challenges that might have popped up
along the way
exiting the data center was such an
exciting journey
and versa was there right from the
beginning to help us to plan
and execute the migration obviously
there were lots of challenges along the
way but the technical staff that verson
had
really helped us to identify solutions
very quickly
so that we didn't impact the schedule we
have a really strong relationship with
versa
and they continue to support us through
a managed services agreement
it sounds like a great partnership and
we work a lot with person they're an
awesome partner
so finally what is next for laurel you
guys are always looking for new and
innovative ways to do things so what can
we expect to see next
well we've been really successful in
cloud at reducing our cost and
increasing our efficiency we've
successfully
shut down 50 of our fleet most of the
week
to save costs we've right-sized most of
our resources so we're just paying for
what we need
we've got more work to do in this area
and our next target is backups
where we think we can make some
significant savings and
increase the resilience of our
environment
david it's been a pleasure speaking to

on the show
and we'll see you next time thank you
thank you
